Container.Name: Loggly
Container.Description: [b]loggly-docker[/b][br/] Docker container for loggly (via rsyslog). Check out Loggly's [Docker logging documentation](https://www.loggly.com/docs/docker-syslog/) to learn more.[br/] [br/] [b]Netowrk Ports[/b][br/] * 514: syslog over TCP[br/] * 514/udp: plain old syslog over udp[br/] [br/] [b]Environment Variables[/b][br/] * TOKEN: Customer Token[br/] * TAG: Source tag [br/]
